<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>sysrule_view_workspace: set table & view to mandatory and view depends on table</description>
        <name>set table & view to mandatory</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
gr.addQuery('element', 'table').addOrCondition('element', 'view');
gr.addQuery('name', 'sysrule_view_workspace');
gr.query();
while (gr.next()) {
	var changed = false;
	var element = gr.getValue('element');
	if (gr.getValue('mandatory') == true)
		gs.info("mandatory value for sysrule_view_workspace." + element + " is already true");
	else {
		gr.setValue('mandatory', true);
		gs.info("Set mandatory value for sysrule_view_workspace." + element + " to true");
		changed = true;
	}
	if ('view' == element) {
		if ('table' == gr.getValue('dependent'))
			gs.info("sysrule_view_workspace.view already has 'table' for dependent field");
		else {
			gr.setValue('dependent', 'table');
			gs.info("Set dependent value for sysrule_view_workspace.view to 'table'");
			changed = true;
		}
		
		if ('table' == gr.getValue('dependent_on_field'))
			gs.info("sysrule_view_workspace.view already has 'table' for dependent_on_field field");
		else {
			gr.setValue('dependent_on_field', 'table');
			gs.info("Set dependent_on_field value for sysrule_view_workspace.view to 'table'");
			changed = true;
		}
	}
	if (changed) {
		gr.setWorkFlow(false);
		gr.setUseEngines(false);
		gr.update();
	}
}

]]></script>
